trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpContent" /> objects that get serialized using the multipart/* content type specification.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用 multipart/* 內容類型規格進行序列化之 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpContent" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The subtype of the multipart content.
trans-unit.target: 多部分內容的子類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="subtype" /> was <see langword="null" /> or contains only white space characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subtype" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或僅包含空白字元。

trans-unit.source: The subtype of the multipart content.
trans-unit.target: 多部分內容的子類型。

trans-unit.source: The boundary string for the multipart content.
trans-unit.target: 多部分內容的界限字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="subtype" /> was <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subtype" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，或是空字串。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="boundary" /> was <see langword="null" /> or contains only white space characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="boundary" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或僅包含空白字元。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="boundary" /> ends with a space character.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="boundary" /> 以空白字元結束。

trans-unit.source: The length of the <paramref name="boundary" /> was greater than 70.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="boundary" /> 的長度大於 70。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP content to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至集合中的 HTTP 內容。

trans-unit.source: Add multipart HTTP content to a collection of <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpContent" /> objects that get serialized using the multipart/* content type specification.
trans-unit.target: 將多重部分 HTTP 內容加入至使用 multipart/* 內容類型規格進行序列化之 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpContent" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="content" /> was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="content" /> 以前是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to releases only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源；<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> and optionally disposes of the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性處置 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent> references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection of <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpContent" /> objects that get serialized using the multipart/* content type specification..
trans-unit.target: 傳回列舉程式，以逐一查看使用 multipart 內容類型規格進行序列化之 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpContent" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可用於逐一查看集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The foreach statement of the C# language (For Each in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: Foreach 陳述式的 C# 語言 （適用於每一個 Visual Basic 中） 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using foreach is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，foreach 建議使用，而不是直接管理 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: The target stream.
trans-unit.target: 目標資料流。

trans-unit.source: Information about the transport (channel binding token, for example).
trans-unit.target: 傳輸的相關資訊 (例如通道繫結權杖)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Serialize the multipart HTTP content to a stream as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步作業方式將多部分 HTTP 內容序列化為資料流。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the target stream.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>之後的所有內容已序列化至目標資料流，物件會完成。

trans-unit.source: The explicit implementation of the <see cref="M:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent.GetEnumerator" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent.GetEnumerator" /> 方法的明確實作。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可用於逐一查看集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The length in bytes of the HHTP content.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 內容的位元組長度。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the HTTP multipart content has a valid length in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 HTTP 多部分內容是否具備有效的位元組長度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="length" /> is a valid length; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若 <paramref name="length" /> 為有效的長度則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent.TryComputeLength%2A> method gives HTTP multipart content the ability to calculate the content length.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.MultipartContent.TryComputeLength%2A>方法可讓 HTTP 多部分內容來計算內容的長度。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for content types which are able to easily calculate the content length.
trans-unit.target: 這是適用於內容的類型，也就是能夠輕易地計算內容的長度。

trans-unit.source: If computing the content length is not possible or expensive (would require the system to buffer the whole content where the serialization would be expensive or require the system to allocate a lot of memory), this method can return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果計算內容的長度不可能或昂貴 （而需要讓系統用來緩衝整個內容序列化會其中可能高度耗費資源，或需要配置大量記憶體系統），這個方法可以傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `false`, this implies that either chunked transfer is needed or the content must get buffered before being sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`false`，這表示，需要區塊的傳輸或內容必須在傳送到伺服器之前會緩衝處理。
